concept.title: Set up Desired Capabilities for WebUI Testing in

conbody.p: Katalon Studio allows you to define desired capabilities for local execution with Chrome, Firefox, Internet Explorer (IE), Safari, Edge or Edge (Chromium) in Project > Settings > Desired Capabilities > WebUI > Chrome/Firefox/IE/Safari/Edge/Edge(Chromium).
This article shows you how to configure some common capabilities in WebUI testing and where they are saved.

li.p: You can find some common desired capabilities configurations in our GitHub sample project: Tips and tricks.
